text: Shipton is a small village in Shropshire, England. It figures prominently in the history of the Samuel More family of Mayflower pilgrims fame. ==See also== *Listed buildings in Shipton, Shropshire == References == * Shipton Shropshire Genealogy Records Search - FamilySearch.org * Church of St James Shipton - British Listed Buildings. Category:Villages in Shropshire
title: Shipton, Shropshire
